Module contents#

Manipulator.binary(self: Logger, message: str, *args, **kwargs) → None#
Manipulator.setup_logging(terminal_handler_level: int = 20, file_handler_level: int = 10, delete_current_log_at_startup: bool = True, file_name: str = 'log.log')#

Optional helper to configure logging. Application can call this but is not automatic.

Parameters:

level (Literal str, optional) – The level of logging. Recommended to use e.g. logging.DEBUG (default is logging.DEBUG).
